column4: By the way, this is what I am trying to install --- http://scid.sourceforge.net/download.html
OK guys what now?? Tcl (don't know what it is) seems to already exist in my system. What is next step?
why not sudo apt-get install scid
I don't know why. Maybe you can't install it that way. Or scid in repositories is older than in that site. Also autohor didn't mention to install that way - probably have a reason I guess....
